多伦岛发生了异变，情况不明.Translation: Anomaly occurred on Toronto Island, situation unknown

洛丹伦命令我部前来查看.Translation: Lordaeron has ordered our unit to investigate

我们将以这座神庙为据点.Translation: We will use this temple as our stronghold

Level 1.Translation: Level 1, EN Translation: Allenw @ Ozlin server

期待这是一个轻松的旅程.Translation: Hopefully, this will be an easy journey

法王之名.Translation: In the name of the Holy King

整顿装备，向岛屿触发.Translation: Reorganise equipment, advance towards the island

诅咒者已被拾取.Translation: The Cursed item has been picked up

诅咒者附带高额减速，并废除人类的武器.Translation: The Cursed comes with a high slowdown effect and nullifies human weapons

这个地方有点古怪.Translation: This place is a bit strange

范围直线 风已拾取.Translation: Straight Wind has been picked up

穿过大门，沿着通道向上走，我们一探究竟.Translation: Pass through the gate, walk up the corridor, and let's find out

变身期间不会受到僵尸伤害，但时间有限.Translation: During transformation, you won't take damage from zombies, but the time is limited

左键释放普通攻击.Translation: Left click to unleash a normal attack

SAWDAD+右键释放八方光刃(伤害极高）.Translation: SAWDAD + Right click to unleash the Eight-direction Blade (high damage)

墙已被拾取.Translation: The wall has been picked up

这个洞穴不应该早被废弃了吗，为何还有如此规模的迷宫.Translation: Shouldn't this cave have been abandoned long ago? Why is there still such a large maze?

注意，在迷宫中，水可为指引正确方向.Translation: Note that in the maze, water can guide the correct direction

解锁机关，我们要离开这个地方.Translation: Unlock the mechanism, we need to leave this place

第一开关已按下.Translation: The first switch has been toggled

第二开关已按下.Translation: The second switch has been toggled

请等待石门打开.Translation: Please wait for the stone door to open

最后开关已按下.Translation: The last switch has been toggled

30s后上方通道打开.Translation: The upper passage will open in 30 seconds

为什么还有传送水晶，是谁在使用它.Translation: Why there are teleport crystals? Who is using them?

我们只有130s，速战速决.Translation: We only have 130 seconds, let's be quick about it

他就是这次异变的源头吗？.Translation: Is he the source of this anomaly?

总之，先击溃他吧.Translation: In any case, let's take him down first

收割者，僵尸神力拾取.Translation: Reaper, zombie divine power picked up

沿着洞穴瀑布向上.Translation: Climb up along the cave waterfall

抓紧离开这里吧.Translation: Let's hurry and leave this place

快上船离开这里.Translation: Hurry up and get on the boat to leave this place

Level 2.Translation: Level 2, EN Translation: Allenw @ Ozlin server

第二章_序幕.Translation: Chapter Two: Prologue, EN Translation: Allenw @ Ozlin server

鉴于之前的探索，这次的异变非同一般.Translation: Given the previous explorations, this anomaly is unusual

我们蒙受损失，必须撤退并向洛丹伦汇报情况.Translation: We have suffered losses; we must retreat and report to Lordaeron

一定会回来的，一定.Translation: We will definitely come back, definitely

这次我们将借道西边的洞穴，向洛丹伦撤退.Translation: This time we will retreat to Lordaeron through the cave to the west

那地方尘封多年，可能还会有守护者.Translation: That place has been sealed for years; there might still be guardians there

行动一定要万分小心.Translation: We must proceed with extreme caution

闪开，我们把一切挡路的障碍都炸开.Translation: Get out of the way; we're going to blow up everything blocking our path

这些石板年久失修了，小心点，士兵.Translation: These stone slabs have not been maintained for years; be careful, soldiers

20s后铁门破碎.Translation: The iron gate will break in 20 seconds

为什么有这么多机关，这里发生过什么？.Translation: Why are there so many mechanisms? What happened here?

20s后铁门打开.Translation: The iron gate will open in 20 seconds

20s后炸开墙壁.Translation: The wall will explode in 20 seconds

是前哨站，我们就快到了.Translation: It's a forward base; we're almost there

30s后炸开石头.Translation: The stones will explode in 30 seconds

是守护者，这老东西还在这里.Translation: It's the guardian; this old thing is still here

没办法了，强行突破.Translation: There's no other choice; we must force our way through

20s后开启传送.Translation: The teleport will open in 20 seconds

传送已经开启，快走.Translation: The teleport is open, hurry up!

感谢miluli提供的模型.Translation: Thanks to miluli for providing the model

他消失了，但我们仍被他玩弄于鼓掌之中.Translation: He has disappeared, but we are still being toyed with by him

25s后开启传送.Translation: The teleport will open in 25 seconds

增益者提升范围内恶灵的能力，强化身体体能.Translation: 增益者提升范围内恶灵的能力，强化身体体能
